title: Recharge and Bond: The Power of Retreats

topics.title: Open Source Software Design Needs
topics.summary: A discussion on the necessity for more designers and product people in the open source software community, suggesting a shift in focus from engineering to design. This highlights the importance of user experience and product management in software development.

topics.title: Personal Retreats and Team Building
topics.summary: An account of a personal retreat taken by a member of the @npmx.dev community, emphasizing the importance of disconnecting and recharging. This event showcases the value of team bonding and reflection in enhancing productivity and creativity.
